pullRequest.title: [NETBEANS-3957] fixed "opened documents list" show HTML code instead of rich text
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-3957
tested with FlatLaf light/dark, Windows, Nimbus and Metal LaFs

commit.message:
[NETBEANS-3957] fixed "opened documents list" show HTML code instead of rich text

tested with FlatLaf light/dark, Windows, Nimbus and Metal LaFs

nodes.bodyText: I think this could be improved if lbl would be declared to be a  JComponent. Most calls will still work, and the cases where that is not the case (calls to setIcon/setText) are already null protected and could just as well be protected with if lbl instanceof JLabel) and only cast at that point.
